text: @realDonaldTrump The latest Coronavirus patient discovered in San Francisco had no travel history, no contacts with anyone from China, South Korea, Italy, Philippines, Vietnam, or ANY other countries with outbreaks of the virus. YOUR WALL didn't prevent it. Explain THAT now.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Italy records first coronavirus death after a spike in cases
entity.description: According to Italian media, a person has died after at least 14 people in the region of Lombardy and two in the nearby region of Veneto were confirmed to be infected with the virus.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
